conv.text: Hello! I am looking for a rare material to create a powerful weapon. Do you know where I can find it?

answers.option: Yes, I know where it is.

conv.text: Excellent! Where can I find it?

answers.option: It is in an ancient temple, guarded by a powerful creature.

conv.text: That is unfortunate. Do you know anyone who may know where it is?

answers.option: Yes, I know someone who may know.

conv.text: I see. How can I get the material from the temple?

answers.option: You must answer three riddles correctly.

conv.text: Who is it? Maybe I can help.
I see. Well, good luck on your quest.
I see. Good luck on your quest.
Ah, the Guardian of the Temple. Good luck on your quest.
You're welcome. Come back if you need any help.
